  • Deprecated Fields
    Field
    Description
    ch.njol.skript.lang.SkriptParser.listSplitPattern
    due to bad naming conventions, use SkriptParser.LIST_SPLIT_PATTERN instead.
    ch.njol.skript.lang.SkriptParser.wildcard
    due to bad naming conventions, use SkriptParser.WILDCARD instead.
    ch.njol.skript.SkriptConfig.enableScriptCaching
    ch.njol.skript.SkriptConfig.logPlayerCommands
    ch.njol.skript.SkriptEventHandler.listenCancelled
    Users should specify the listening behavior in the event declaration. "on any %event%:", "on cancelled %event%:".
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    ch.njol.skript.bukkitutil.PlayerUtils.getOnlinePlayers()
    use Bukkit.getOnlinePlayers() instead
    ch.njol.skript.classes.ClassInfo.changer(SerializableChanger<? super T>)
    ch.njol.skript.classes.ClassInfo.getMath()
    ch.njol.skript.classes.ClassInfo.getMathRelativeType()
    ch.njol.skript.classes.ClassInfo.getRelativeMath()
    ch.njol.skript.classes.ClassInfo.isVaildCodeName(String)
    ch.njol.skript.classes.ClassInfo.math(Class<R>, Arithmetic<? super T, R>)
    ch.njol.skript.classes.ConfigurationSerializer.deserialize(String)
    ch.njol.skript.classes.ConfigurationSerializer.deserializeCSOld(String, Class<T>)
    ch.njol.skript.classes.EnumSerializer.deserialize(String)
    ch.njol.skript.classes.Serializer.deserialize(String)
    ch.njol.skript.classes.YggdrasilSerializer.deserialize(String)
    ch.njol.skript.command.Commands.skriptCommandExists(String)
    ch.njol.skript.command.Commands.unregisterCommands(File)
    ch.njol.skript.lang.function.Functions.clearFunctions()
    ch.njol.skript.lang.function.Functions.clearFunctions(String)
    ch.njol.skript.lang.function.Functions.getFunction(String)
    in favour of Functions.getGlobalFunction(String) for proper name.
    ch.njol.skript.lang.function.Functions.getSignature(String)
    in favour of Functions.getGlobalSignature(String) for proper name.
    ch.njol.skript.lang.function.ScriptFunction.setReturnValue(T[])
    Use ScriptFunction.returnValues(Event, Expression)
    ch.njol.skript.lang.parser.ParserInstance.Data.onCurrentScriptChange(Config)
    See ScriptLoader.LoaderEvent.
    ch.njol.skript.lang.parser.ParserInstance.deleteCurrentSkriptEvent()
    Use ParserInstance.setCurrentStructure(Structure) with 'null'.
    ch.njol.skript.lang.parser.ParserInstance.getCurrentOptions()
    Use Script.getData(Class) instead. The StructOptions.OptionsData class should be obtained. Example: script.getData(OptionsData.class)
    ch.njol.skript.lang.parser.ParserInstance.getCurrentSkriptEvent()
    Use ParserInstance.getCurrentStructure()
    ch.njol.skript.lang.parser.ParserInstance.setCurrentScript(Config)
    Addons should no longer be modifying this.
    ch.njol.skript.lang.parser.ParserInstance.setCurrentSkriptEvent(SkriptEvent)
    Use ParserInstance.setCurrentStructure(Structure).
    ch.njol.skript.lang.SelfRegisteringSkriptEvent.afterParse(Config)
    Use SelfRegisteringSkriptEvent.postLoad() instead.
    ch.njol.skript.lang.SelfRegisteringSkriptEvent.register(Trigger)
    This method's functionality can be replaced by overriding SelfRegisteringSkriptEvent.postLoad(). Normally, that method would register the parsed trigger with SkriptEventHandler. A reference to the Trigger is available through SkriptEvent.trigger.
    ch.njol.skript.lang.SelfRegisteringSkriptEvent.unregister(Trigger)
    This method's functionality can be replaced by overriding SelfRegisteringSkriptEvent.unload(). Normally, that method would unregister the parsed trigger with SkriptEventHandler. A reference to the Trigger is available through SkriptEvent.trigger.
    ch.njol.skript.lang.SelfRegisteringSkriptEvent.unregisterAll()
    This method should no longer be used. Each trigger should be unregistered through SelfRegisteringSkriptEvent.unregister(Trigger).
    ch.njol.skript.registrations.Classes.deserialize(String, String)
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.deleteCurrentEvent()
    Use ParserInstance.deleteCurrentEvent().
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.getCurrentEventName()
    Use ParserInstance.getCurrentEventName().
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.getCurrentEvents()
    Use ParserInstance.getCurrentEvents().
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.getCurrentLoops()
    Use ParserInstance.getCurrentSections(Class).
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.getCurrentScript()
    Use ParserInstance.getCurrentScript().
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.getCurrentSections()
    Use ParserInstance.getCurrentSections().
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.getHasDelayBefore()
    Use ParserInstance.getHasDelayBefore().
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.isCurrentEvent(Class<? extends Event>)
    Use ParserInstance.isCurrentEvent(Class)
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.isCurrentEvent(Class<? extends Event>...)
    Use ParserInstance.isCurrentEvent(Class[]).
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.loadedScripts()
    Use ScriptLoader.getLoadedScripts().size().
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.loadedTriggers()
    Use ScriptLoader.getLoadedScripts() and Script.getStructures().size(). Please note that a Structure may have multiple triggers, and this is only an estimate.
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.loadScripts(Config...)
    Callers should not be using configs. Use ScriptLoader.loadScripts(Set, OpenCloseable).
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.loadScripts(List<Config>)
    Callers should not be using configs. Use ScriptLoader.loadScripts(Set, OpenCloseable).
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.loadScripts(List<Config>, List<LogEntry>)
    Callers should not be using configs. Use ScriptLoader.loadScripts(Set, OpenCloseable).
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.loadStructure(Config)
    This method has no functionality, it just returns its input.
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.reloadScript(File)
    Use ScriptLoader.reloadScript(Script, OpenCloseable).
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.reloadScript(File, OpenCloseable)
    Use ScriptLoader.reloadScript(Script, OpenCloseable).
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.reloadScripts(File)
    Use ScriptLoader.reloadScripts(Set, OpenCloseable).
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.reloadScripts(File, OpenCloseable)
    Use ScriptLoader.reloadScripts(java.util.Set<org.skriptlang.skript.lang.script.Script>, ch.njol.util.OpenCloseable).
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.setCurrentEvent(String, Class<? extends Event>...)
    Use ParserInstance.setCurrentEvent(String, Class[]).
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.setCurrentLoops(List<SecLoop>)
    Never use this method, it has no effect.
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.setCurrentScript(Config)
    Addons should no longer be modifying this.
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.setCurrentSections(List<TriggerSection>)
    Use ParserInstance.setCurrentSections(List).
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.setHasDelayBefore(Kleenean)
    Use ParserInstance.setHasDelayBefore(Kleenean).
    ch.njol.skript.ScriptLoader.unloadScript(File)
    Use ScriptLoader.unloadScript(Script).
    ch.njol.skript.Skript.getInstance()
    Use Skript.getSkriptPluginInstance() instead
    ch.njol.skript.SkriptEventHandler.addSelfRegisteringTrigger(Trigger)
    This method no longer does anything as self registered Triggers are unloaded when the SkriptEvent is unloaded (no need to keep tracking them here).
    ch.njol.skript.util.Direction.deserialize(String)
    ch.njol.skript.util.SkriptColor.fromDyeData(short)
    Magic numbers
    ch.njol.skript.util.SkriptColor.fromWoolData(short)
    Magic numbers
    ch.njol.skript.util.SkriptColor.getDyeData()
    ch.njol.skript.util.SkriptColor.getWoolData()
    ch.njol.skript.util.Timespan.fromTicks(long)
    Use Timespan(TimePeriod, long)
    ch.njol.skript.util.Timespan.fromTicks_i(long)
    Use Timespan.fromTicks(long) instead. Old API naming changes.
    ch.njol.skript.util.Timespan.getMilliSeconds()
    Use Timespan.getAs(TimePeriod)
    ch.njol.skript.util.Timespan.getTicks()
    Use Timespan.getAs(TimePeriod)
    ch.njol.skript.util.Timespan.getTicks_i()
    Use getTicks() instead. Old API naming changes.
    ch.njol.util.Math2.ceilI(double)
    ch.njol.util.Math2.floor(float)
    ch.njol.util.Math2.floorI(double)
    ch.njol.util.Math2.max(double...)
    ch.njol.util.Math2.max(double, double, double)

    ch.njol.util.Math2.max(int, int, int)
    ch.njol.util.Math2.min(double...)
    ch.njol.util.Math2.min(double, double, double)
    ch.njol.util.Math2.min(int...)
    ch.njol.util.Math2.min(int, int, int)
    ch.njol.yggdrasil.Fields.setFields(Object, Yggdrasil)
    org.skriptlang.skript.lang.structure.Structure.getEntryContainer()
    This method will be removed in a future version. If the EntryContainer is needed outside of Structure.init(Literal[], int, ParseResult, EntryContainer), the Structure should keep a reference to it.

    Constructor
